{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=BR100 |fcc_date=11/02/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |type=wireless router |fcc_id=WBV-BR100 |ic_id=7774A-BR100 |pcb_id=2976400101 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16BS-5T |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J9 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (9600,8,N,1),, 3.3V TTL,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none (internal) |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;1; ,,, 2A, 4.2V-16V Input Fast Transient Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MP1492;;1; |flags=dmesg |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.85.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=aerohive |oui=08:EA:44 |oui_eth=08:EA:44 }} {{TagLine|BR100 Branch Router}} :[http://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/6.6r1/hm/full/help.htm#hw/br/BR100.htm Hardware Reference] "2976400101" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The Atheros WiSoC used is assumed to be AR9331. :Flash size is per the below dmesg output. {{WiFiCert|WFA13247|11/08/2011}} ===info dump=== {{SCollapse|stock dmesg â€¢ >> . |
